abstract: Marcel Kittel wins second stage in Giro d'Italia bicycle race; Tom Dumoulin retains overall lead.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; Top Three in Giro Are Separated by a Second
headline.main: Top Three in Giro Separated by a Second

snippet: Tom Dumoulin retained the overall lead of the Giro d’Italia as Marcel Kittel sprinted to victory in the second stage.
lead_paragraph: Tom Dumoulin retained the overall lead of the Giro d’Italia as Marcel Kittel sprinted to victory in the second stage.
